title: Version 2.2 Features
message:
Version 2.2 Features

1. Updated libraries
2. Existing products and categories are not dublicated on restore
3. Sample categories colors improved
4. Category dialog now has additional Saturation bar for precise color
control
5. Share a product's image to other apps
